Special: SM Wep, Felling (4), Sanctified, Unbalanced

Note: Space Marines Only. Master-Crafted Relic Astartes Power Axe of the Black Consuls Chapter. Wielder has Fear +2 vs Chaos Space Marines, or Fear +3 vs Word Bearer Chaos Space Marines specifically. However Word Bearers double the effect of appropriate Hatred Talents against the wielder.
